S

selectAllMessages() - Static method in class database.DatabaseConnection
Selects all the messages from the messages table of the DB.
selectAllUsers() - Static method in class database.DatabaseConnection
Selects all the users from the users table of the DB.
selectHistory(User, User) - Static method in class database.DatabaseConnection
Selects all the messages with the couple of given Users in source or destination, in either way.
selectIp(String) - Static method in class database.DatabaseConnection
Returns the IP address of the user with the given pseudo.
setContent(String) - Method in class model.Message
Sets the message text or content
setDest(User) - Method in class model.Message
Sets the destination User
setIp(InetAddress) - Method in class model.User
Sets the IP address.
setPseudo(String) - Method in class model.User
Sets the pseudo.
setSrc(User) - Method in class model.Message
Sets the source User
stop() - Method in class controller.BroadcastListener
Stops the running thread by changing "isStopped" value and closing the DatagramSocket.
stop() - Method in class controller.MessageWaiter
Closes the Socket and the ServerSocket and allows waitForMessage() to stop.
